# Business Pathfinder

> Personal brand website for SJ Park - Business Pathfinder, featuring business consulting, psychology insights, and professional services.

## Site Information

- **URL**: https://business-pathfinder.com
- **Mirror (RU)**: https://business-pathfinder-chronicles.com
- **Language**: English (en)
- **Type**: Business Consulting & Personal Brand Website
- **Built with**: Astro 5.0 + Tailwind CSS
- **Contact**: info@business-pathfinder-chronicles.com

## Main Navigation

### Core Pages
- `/` - Homepage with hero section, featured services, and recent content
- `/about-me` - About SJ Park - Business Pathfinder
- `/services` - Consulting and business services offered
- `/contacts` - Contact information and consultation request form
- `/gallery` - Photo and media gallery
- `/donate` - Support and donation options
- `/vacancies` - Current job openings and career opportunities
- `/skills` - Professional skills and expertise showcase

### Content Sections
- `/blog` - Blog with articles on business psychology, personal branding, and business strategy
- `/project` - Portfolio of completed projects and case studies

### Legal & Policy Pages
- `/privacy-policy` - Privacy policy
- `/user-agreement` - User agreement and terms of service
- `/offer-agreement` - Offer agreement
- `/content-policy` - Content usage policy

## Blog Content

The blog features articles categorized into:

### Topics
- **Business Psychology** - Psychological aspects of business and entrepreneurship
- **Business Reestablishment** - Business transformation and restructuring strategies
- **Personal Branding** - Building and managing personal brand identity

**Blog Configuration**:
- Posts per page: 6
- RSS feed available at `/rss.xml`
- Blog post URL pattern: `/blog/{slug}`
- Related posts enabled (4 related posts per article)

## Projects

Portfolio showcasing business consulting projects and case studies:

### Featured Projects
- **Architect of Personal Brands** - Personal brand development case study
- **Elyqo** - Business project case study

**Project Configuration**:
- Projects per page: 6
- Project URL pattern: `/project/{slug}`

## Social Media Presence

- **TikTok**: @business.pathfinder
- **YouTube**: @sjpark_businesspathfinder
- **LinkedIn**: sj-park-business-pathfinder
- **Facebook**: Business Pathfinder Official Page
- **X (Twitter)**: @SJ_ParkBp
- **Instagram**: @business.pathfinder.official
- **Telegram**: @arthelokyo

## Services Offered

Business consulting services including:
- Business strategy and transformation
- Personal brand development and positioning
- Business psychology consulting
- Crisis management and business reestablishment
- Professional skills development

## Contact Methods

### Consultation Request
Consultation form available at `/contacts` page for booking professional services.

### Donations & Support
Multiple payment methods available at `/donate`
